backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files and components with high-confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and content of various frontend files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining extensive OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry that loads the React app and sets metadata and favicon for the Flubby site.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the LandingPage.
frontend/src/components/landing/AtAGlanc: Displays token facts in a card grid with confirmed and TBA values.
frontend/src/components/landing/ClosingC: Closing call‑to‑action section with motivational text, a disabled button, and a working X link.
frontend/src/components/landing/FlubbyGa: Gallery section showing six static Flubby images with motivational captions in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Hero banner with intro text, disabled CTAs, ticker display, and a main Flubby hero image.
frontend/src/components/landing/Highligh: Highlights section presenting four themed value cards with icons and descriptive text.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingL: Provides the main landing page layout with background pattern, content wrapper, and a themed footer including a dynamic year and referral link.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Composes the full landing page by rendering all major sections inside the LandingLayout.
frontend/src/components/landing/Manifest: Renders the emotional “Flubby’s Story” manifesto with themed cards, icons, and motivational text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for authentication, exposing identity state, login, and logout utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing, noting no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and a custom warm color theme, typography, and utility styles for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, requirements, features, and image needs for the Flubby landing page.
